extendedInfo.description: FlatBox UCCW Skin includes 6 matching UCCW widgets styles that can be used with the FlatBox skin and icon pack which is available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.esethnet.flatbox -----------------This is NOT a standalone app. You need to download UCCW (free) from Google Play before you install this app. Widgets included in the app are: Clock, Date, Battery, Missed Calls, Text Messages and Weather.-----------------How to apply the widget?1. Press and Hold on the homescreen and tap on widgets.2. Scroll to UCCW Widgets and tap on 1x1 or 2x2.3. Scroll and select the FlatBox Widget you like.-----------------Editable HotspotsAll widgets by default open up the hotspot edit screen upon click. After applying the widget you can tap on the widget to open the HotSpot Edit screen and customize the hotspot.-----------------If you have any icon request or questions then feel free to email me at gseth83@gmail.com
